allow: Bash(timeout 30 cmd /c "for /L %i in (1,1,30) do @(netstat -ano | findstr :8080 | findstr LISTENING >nul && echo Server is ready && exit /b 0 || timeout /t 1 >nul) && echo Timeout waiting for server")
